this is an add on
descriptionHtml:
I do this by request
a retexture of the sword from the Real Damascus steel armor and weapons mod.

you need the original mod first 
to find in http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29392/

install with NMM
overwhrite the files

or manually
drop or copy paste the folder in to your skyrim data folder
author: ILIAS
